revised_title: Diffraction of SH Waves by Arbitrary Shaped Cracks in Two Dimensions
tldr: This article investigates the diffraction of SH waves by arbitrary shaped cracks in two dimensions. It uses Bessel functions and the Cauchy integral to analyze the problem and provides a proof of the function's properties. The study helps in understanding crack propagation and wave behavior in materials.
scientific_discipline: Engineering and Technology > Mechanics and Materials
